description:
Stain strikes again, and this time the U.A. students are around when he does. Will they be able to hold him off until the pros come?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hero Goroshi Stain vs Yuuei Seito
Hero Killer: Stain vs U.A. Students
Le tueur de héros vs. Les élèves de Yuei
ヒーロー殺しステインVS雄英生徒
